categories.misc: Quelques informations importantes sur le fonctionnement de quelques machines et de quelques outils essentiels.
categories.engine: Peut-être la plus cruciale de toutes les machines, les moteurs sont utilisés pour fournir la puissance. Chacun a son propre moment de torsion et sa caractéristique de vitesse, mais ils ont généralement tous un moment de torsion faible à grande vitesse. Chaque moteur a aussi ses propres exigences en termes d'approvisionnement en énergie et certains moteurs ont leurs propres bizarreries spéciales qu'il est sage de connaître.
categories.trans: The possibilities would be rather limited if power produced by the engines had to be consumed at the source. Fortunately, it is simple and easy to transport this power, almost losslessly, across any distance you care to. One important thing to note about many of these is that they are directional - they transmit power in only one direction. Machines will render a green cage around their input block(s) and a red one around their output block(s).
categories.procmachine: These machines are used to process materials, either creating new materials, increasing yields, or converting items between mods.
categories.utilmachine: These are machines which fill specific purposes not easily categorized into the other groups.
categories.prodmachine: Ce sont des machines utilisées pour produite les ressources de base, soit directement du minnage soit d'ingrédients bruts.
categories.survmachine: These machines are used to evaluate your surroundings, to become more aware of potential dangers or items of value.
categories.wepmachine: Weaponry- and Protection-type machines are used to attack opponents - either mobs or players - and defend yourself from their attacks.
categories.farmmachine: These machines are designed to be used to either replace or enhance traditional farms.
categories.cosmachine: Cosmetic machines provide little to no utilitarian bonus, but provide visual or acoustic appeal.
categories.accmachine: Pas terriblement utiles seules, ces machines sont concue pour fonctionner avec d'autres afin d'en augmenter leurs fonctionnalités.
categories.tool: These are the tools powered by wound-up coils. Their coil depletes slightly with each use. To recharge them, craft them with a new coil and you will get the old coil back, which can be used again.
categories.resource: Ce sont des éléments de type ressource, utilisés pour various purposes.
